# Class SpeechSynthesisConfig

Class for configuring speech synthesis settings.

##### Index

### Methods

getDefault

## Methods

### `Static`getDefault

  * getDefault(): {  
inferenceConfig: {  
alpha: number;  
beta: number;  
diffusionSteps: number;  
speechTempo: number;  
};  
postprocessingConfig: { sampleRate: number; trimSilence: boolean };  
preprocessingConfig: { normalizeText: boolean };  
}

Returns the default speech synthesis configuration.

#### Returns {  
inferenceConfig: {  
alpha: number;  
beta: number;  
diffusionSteps: number;  
speechTempo: number;  
};  
postprocessingConfig: { sampleRate: number; trimSilence: boolean };  
preprocessingConfig: { normalizeText: boolean };  
}

Default speech synthesis configuration
